channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6623] IT - searching for "encoder" gives a 500 error as result
item.description:
Hello,

In the Italian channel, searching for "encoder" o a keyword containing the word "encoder" results in a 500 error.In FF the results are correct, see screenshot attached.

This seems to only happen if there are results for that keyword, when Fact Finder finds no results for a keyword containing "encoder", then the behavior is normal and the no result page is displayed.

Is there a possible relation with ticket DISTRELEC-6622?

Thanks,
Laura
item.summary: IT - searching for "encoder" gives a 500 error as result

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
We are having more searches ending in a 500 error,

Fix it with high priority.

Thanks Laura

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6645] Searchfilter - FE issue
item.description:
Issues

  1. If you mouse-over one of the filter-accordeons(marked in screenshot2) the "button" turns white, thats ok. But if you want to hide the containing filters by clicking on it, it stays white, that's wrong. It should turn back the color to the "darker grey".
  2. Please come back to me with a solution to handle filters with long names in order to avoid line-breaks(see screeenshot2).

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please put an estimate and start without assigning back to me, thx.

As discussed, only the point 1 is implemented.
Please test after the next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6625] SEO - Robots.txt - Security & Crawl Update
item.description:
Observations :

  • GoogleBot and other bots are crawling unnecessary urls.

Impacts :

  • Crawlers spend time on this useless url patterns and loose themself in infinite query and pollute their index.
  • That lead into not crawling the important and relevant pages and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.
  • On our server side this create unnecessary traffic and log jam.

Demands :

  • Replace the entire content of http://www.distrelec.XX/robots.txt by this content (diff): 
    # Allow access to AdsBot
User-agent: AdsBot-Google
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Disallow:

# Block access & indexation to specific groups of pages
User-agent: *
Allow: */p/*?*page=1*
Disallow: *&filterURL=*
Disallow: */p/*?*page=*
Noindex: *&filterURL=*
Noindex: */p/*?*page=*

Disallow: */search
Disallow: */checkToggles
Disallow: */cart
Disallow: */checkout
Disallow: */my-account
Disallow: */login
Disallow: */import-tool
Disallow: */support
Disallow: */feedback
Disallow: *//app/etc/local.xml
Disallow: */medias/sys_master/*.gz
Disallow: */gsitemap*.xml.gz
Disallow: *serviceplus*
Disallow: */ServicePlusShop/*
Disallow: */alsoBought*
Disallow: */recommendation*
Disallow: */MobileStore*
Disallow: */sendToFriend*
Disallow: */availability*
Disallow: */compare*
Disallow: */facet*
Disallow: */import-tool-upload*
Disallow: */c/TODO*
Disallow: *{=it.*
Disallow: *undefined*

Noindex: */search
Noindex: */checkToggles
Noindex: */cart
Noindex: */checkout
Noindex: */my-account
Noindex: */login
Noindex: */import-tool
Noindex: */support
Noindex: */feedback
Noindex: *//app/etc/local.xml
Noindex: */medias/sys_master/*.gz
Noindex: */gsitemap*.xml.gz
Noindex: *serviceplus*
Noindex: */ServicePlusShop/*
Noindex: */alsoBought*
Noindex: */recommendation*
Noindex: */MobileStore*
Noindex: */sendToFriend*
Noindex: */availability*
Noindex: */compare*
Noindex: */facet*
Noindex: */import-tool-upload*
Noindex: */c/TODO*
Noindex: *{=it.*
Noindex: *undefined*

# Allow search crawlers to discover the sitemap
Sitemap: /sitemap_index.xml

# Block Bad-Bot/Useless-Bot
User-agent: CazoodleBot
User-agent: MJ12bot
User-agent: dotbot/1.0
User-agent: Gigabot
User-agent: admantx
User-agent: Wget
User-agent: semvisuBot
User-agent: Baiduspider
User-agent: SITRIX Crawler
User-agent: BLEXBot
User-agent: YandexBot
User-agent: Yandex
User-agent: Sogou
User-agent: AhrefsBots
User-agent: Exabot
User-agent: spbot
User-agent: Fetchbot
User-agent: betaBot
User-agent: LinkpadBot
User-agent: Mail.RU_Bot
User-agent: SeznamBot
User-agent: DotBot
User-agent: Yeti
User-agent: SMTBot
User-agent: Findxbot
User-agent: Genio
User-agent: BubING
User-agent: proximic
User-agent: coccoc
User-agent: GrapeshotCrawler
User-agent: savetheworldheritage.org
Disallow: /

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check after next Q deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6618] TranslationCR - NL, Cart
item.description:
• URL of the page       : [1]https://test.distrelec.nl/cart
  • Wrong Translation   : Winkelwagentje
  • Correct Translation  : Winkelwagen
  • Screenshot of the page (with marked text-part, see note below.)

—

 

Important Notes:

  • Please mark the corresponding text-part directly in the screenshot, not with arrows in Outlook as these are converted by the ticket-system to individual pictures with no relation to the screenshot.
  • Please remove your email-footers and all unncessary information as those emails are automatically converted into tickets which we have to review and cleanup afterwards.
  • Please Keep in mind that the changes will be deployed to the system in development-cycles, so as we seed a deployment for this it can take a while until the change is available.
  • Please don't report text-parts which have your country-code in front.
      For example: "(se) ....."

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] https://test.distrelec.nl/cart
[Created via e-mail received from: "Sigarlakie, Rex" <rex.sigarlakie@distrelec.com>]

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6610] EE Q //Customer Registration form should be marked as mandatory
item.description:
Today the fields acts as mandatory, but it is bot MARKED as such

 

Fields name:

-       In Estonian - KMKR (VAT Number)

-       In Russian - Идентификатор НДС KMKR (VAT Number)

 

Please mark it as mandatory

 

From: Pudov, Igor
Sent: Montag, 23. März 2015 15:09
To: Ilie, Oana
Cc: Pesti, Ksenija
Subject: Customer registration

 

Hi Oana!

Question regarding customer registration in Estonian website

KMKR filed (VAT) isnt marked with * , but when i try to register customer system says that this field is mandatory!

 

Please check

 

 

 

 

 

Igor Pudov

Müügijuht/Inbound Sales Inquiries

 

Elfa Distrelec

Paldiski road 15

EE-10137 Tallinn/Estonia

Tel. +372 6667825

Mob. +372 56607 603

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6426] Auto-apply filter and icons
item.description:
Original request:
Hi,
Please fix the information line above the product list

  • Auto Apply-Filter text: For the languages which are longer, please write 2 lines as in the dirty mock-up attached, so that the full name can be read instead of ".." (see screenshot 1)
  • "Print" and "share" icon should be placed below, as text is ovelapping them (see screenshots 2 & 3)

Thanks
Laura

New requirement:
As discussed with laura:

  • Instead of showing "..." long sentences should get a line-break.
  • Move the print- and share-icon up (According to attached screenshot)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Rafael,
In which sprint will this be corrected?
Thanks,
Laura

As discussed with laura:

  • Instead of showing "..." long sentences should get a line-break.
  • Move the print- and share-icon up (According to attached screenshot)
Please estimate, thx.

Hi Ruben, Rafael,

Regarding the print/share icons: after the talked, I checked the two options and in the top it catches too much attention, if possible it would be great to place it below.

Thank you,
Laura

As discussed with Florian and Rafael,
we should move the share & print icons to the top (See attachment) because these icons apply to the whole page, not only the listing.

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

Hi,

The position of the print and share icon changes when searching (screenshot - 5) or when navigating (screenshot -6)

Can you please update the translation in CH_FR channel of "Auto-apply filter", please use: "Auto-rafraichissement des résultats"

Thanks,
Laura
Please test after the next deployment

Note that in the sentence "I have already a Customer Number", the words "Customer Number" are in bold.

For this, we set the text like this in our code:

I have already a <strong>Customer Number</stong>

everything that Needs to be bold was amrked with <b> .... </b>

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5960] SEO - Fluctuation Issues - Empty Category/Manufacturer Pages Issues - 0 results to redirect in 301 to upper hierarchy level
item.description:
Observations :

  • There is a fluctuation of our assortment of products over time.
  • This product fluctuation affect the active category pages.
  • Manual maintenance on PIM also create a fluctuation on category pages.
  • This result into 15 to 20% of accessible category pages inside hybris with 0 results category pages. (10% on /c/cat-D* pattern, 20 % on /c/cat-numericID pattern)
  • Google have & is crawling and indexing those pages.
  • Those pages have and will accumulate over time "seo weight".

Impacts :

  • Google is wasting crawl time on 0 content pages.
  • Over the time this number is going to grow.
  • No SEO correction = Destroying the accumulated seo weight of those previously content filled pages.
  • No SEO correction is an equivalent of a failed SEO migration

Demands :

  • Redirect in 301 the 0 results category/manufaturer pages to there upper category/level.
    • Exemple 1 :
      This empty category page :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Ger%C3%A4teschalter/Industrie-Kippschalter/Miniatur-Kippschalter/Zubeh%C3%B6r/c/cat-DC-21695
      Must be redirect in 301 to the upper category level :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Ger%C3%A4teschalter/Industrie-Kippschalter/Miniatur-Kippschalter/c/cat-DC-1101
    • Exemple 2 :
      This empty manufacturer page :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/kabeltronik/man_kbl
      Must be redirect in 301 to the manufacturers page :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Fluctuation Issues - Empty Category/Manufacturer Pages Issues - 0 results to redirect in 301 to upper hierarchy level

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: As we discussed with Francesco, It is not possible to do this. Hence I m forwarding it to you.
I will check with PIM if something is doable.
@Francesco : If I'm providing inside PIM import a column for every category with a redirection id to use, is it more doable like this ?

The issue has been solved implementing this logic.

The redirection works only for search bots
The redirection is done recursively until a category with at least one product is found. Or until the root category.

All the other cases will work as usual.

It's very important to know that the check of the number of products is peformed through the factfinder index. This means speed.
But, on the other hand, we have to wait until the fact finder export is done, and the FF system is then aware of the status of the category structure.

Great news, thank you Francesco.
When will it be deploy on Q ?

We're going to deploy now the new release v3.2.m0
Tomorrow you can test.

@Francesco : I just tried it on Q, it does'nt seem to work
(http://test.distrelec.ch/de/*/c/cat-DC-21695 is not redirected anywhere)

Hi Pierre
sorry, i haven't informed you that this redirection is working only for Web Crawlers bots.
Try again by changing the user agent.

@Francesco :
Ok, I just tried it with a bot UA, it work great !
From my point of view it's ready for P.

Ok, i will resolve the issue because the test in Q was successful.
Pierre, please close this after the check in production.
Please close if ok

Live test with google UA :

Exemple 1
This empty category page :
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Ger%C3%A4teschalter/Industrie-Kippschalter/Miniatur-Kippschalter/Zubeh%C3%B6r/c/cat-DC-21695
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Ger%C3%A4teschalter/Industrie-Kippschalter/Miniatur-Kippschalter/c/cat-DC-1101
OK on P

Exemple 2 :
This empty manufacturer page :
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/kabeltronik/man_kbl : no redirection.
NOK on P
Please review
